```{r}
library(shiny)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(shinythemes)
```

```{r}
ui <- fluidPage(
  shinythemes::themeSelector(),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      sliderTextInput(
       inputId = "month",
       label = "Pick a month:", 
        choices = month.name
      ),
      actionButton(
        "button", "Press me"
      )
    ),
    mainPanel(
      textOutput("aux")
    )
  )
)

server <- function(input, output, session){
  rval_button <- eventReactive(input$button, {input$month})
  output$aux <- renderText({
    month <- rval_button()
    paste("The month you selected is", month)
  })
}
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
